db:abstract.db:para: Provides context data for populating or extending a context menu with actions.
This type was introduced in QtWebEngine 1.3.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: WebEngineContextMenuData is returned by WebEngineView::contextMenuData() after a context menu event, and contains information about where the context menu event took place. This is also in the context in which any context specific WebEngineView::WebAction will be performed.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] isContentEditable : bool
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the content is editable by the user; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] isValid : bool
db:section.db:para: Is true if the context data is valid; otherwise false.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] linkText : string
db:section.db:para: Returns the text of a link if the context is a link.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] linkUrl : url
db:section.db:para: Returns the URL of a link if the context is a link.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] mediaType : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Returns the type of the media element or MediaTypeNone if the context is not a media element.

db:td.db:para: The context is not a media element.
The context is an image element
The context is a video element
The context is an audio element
The context is a canvas element

db:section.db:title: [read-only] mediaUrl : url
db:section.db:para: If the context is a media element, returns the URL of that media.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] position : point
db:section.db:para: Returns the position of the context, usually the mouse position where the context menu event was triggered.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] selectedText : string
db:section.db:para: Returns the selected text of the context.
